content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1600930389236{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606795189{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600930416197{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_01a_b.jpg?id=11351) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Uncover Brand YOU

Start the design process by completing our thought-provoking Clarity Questionnaire.

This all-important document will help to refine your values, customer profile and business mission to create a brand and website that evokes the right emotional response from the people who matter most to your business.

By truly understanding the motivations of your market, you can connect. Connection means trust, and trust leads to sustained business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600930304586{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_01a_a.jpg?id=11352) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1515668503455{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606801272{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515724896319{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/Confetti-Design-Affordable-web-design-Melbourne-how-we-do-it-l.jpeg?id=11189) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600930410092{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/Confetti-Design-Affordable-web-design-Melbourne-how-we-do-it-b.jpg?id=11299) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Strategy

Now, the fun stuff begins!

It doesn’t matter how brilliant your websites – or other digital solutions – are.

Online presence means nothing without a smart strategy to back it up. It’s our not-so-secret weapon.

With decades of experience in business development, we give you the resources, mentoring and fine ideas to lift your confidence and growth. Let’s start brainstorming.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1515467671185{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_03_design.jpg?id=11146) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606807414{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”imgtxt-mobvw”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515728302333{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_03_design-b.jpg?id=11297) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Design

Let our website designers do their magic.

Designing a brand or getting a website for your business can be really daunting. It’s easy to feel out of your element, overwhelmed by where to start and confused by the technology.

And that’s where we come in! We make the whole process as straightforward and enjoyable as possible.

While each project we do has its own flavour to suit the client’s brief, the Confetti way is sophisticated, sleek, and modern. We aim to create the right lasting impression every time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1517038391651{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_03_design-a.jpg?id=11296) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1500372912118{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_04-1.jpg?id=10457) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606814045{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1517038417143{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_04_a.jpg?id=11301) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515728307869{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_04_b.jpg?id=11300) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Development

The tech stuff stays easy with our programmers taking care of business!

A lot happens behind the scenes of a small business website.

At the end of the day, our intention is to build websites that look great and are easy to navigate, but also have all the important ‘tech’ stuff so search engines know your website exists.

When it comes to eCommerce websites, we offer two options that will make your online store easy to manage and provide the smoothest customer experience: WordPress and Shopify.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1512707418308{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_05-2.jpg?id=10824) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606820708{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”imgtxt-mobvw”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515728313062{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_05_b.jpg?id=11302) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Support

Hey, we’d like you to meet some really amazing people.

Tap into our fantastic network of trusted collaborators!

Need website hosting and maintenance? Want to create a video for your home page? Looking for copywriting to tie your site together and reflect your brand? Need someone who knows how to generate sales?

We offer you a blend of in-house services and introductions to external partners to maximise your chances of business success online.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515728075319{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/confetti_process_no_05_a.jpg?id=11303) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1599820679263{background-color: #dbdbd9 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1500631307636{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1599820690091{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1500630930752{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”14169″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1600328166129{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Plus … each small business web design project is carefully mentored by me, Johannah Barton.

We help clients from all over the world but I take a hands-on approach in every project. We will likely become good friends as we work closely together in a collaborative manner to bring the best of you into the brand and website.

For more than 10 years, I worked with large organisations taking their brand and translating that into a corporate wardrobe. In this role, I worked with Creative Agencies to develop direct marketing plans, including catalogues and websites.

So when we work together, not only do you get the countless hours of marketing and design experience from working with these leading brands and agencies, you get a very personalised service.

Our goal is always to deliver a beautiful result and ensure it’s an affordable web design and branding service too!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text] BOOK A FREE CALL WITH ME [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1565065925491{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1499608095407{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Some nice words from happy customers

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1517215636165{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
